name: Earthblade (itch)
description:
Earthblade is a 2D action platformer made by a team of 3 students in the Spring of 2022.  This team had a brilliant mix of art, design, and programming knowledge to create a simple, yet fully functioning project.  This is the most complete project to be released on this channel yet.  Can you make it all the way to the end of the game?

Team:

Ethan B - Art

Jonathan G - Programming

Rowan C - Design and Music

How to Play:

WASD to Move

M or Space to swing sword

Point movement keys in the direction you want to swing the sword.  EX: to jump, press the S+Space (or M) key at the same time.
